name: Greg Kuperberg
content: Greg Kuperberg Greg Kuperberg I am a Professor in the Mathematics Department at UC Davis. E-mail: Professional Research interests: Quantum algebra, geometric topology, quantum information theory, convex geometry, combinatorics My publications (Google Scholar) and CV Unfinished notes on quantum probability, and a 2005 version Department profile Students Dongseok Kim (late) (2003) Chris Bumgardner (2011) Sonya Berg (2012) Rohit Thomas (2012) Steven Lu (2014) Eric Samperton (2018)
